bibl.title: A Scene from Comedy in Brindisi.
bibl.note: Mosaic of a comic scene (Trajanic period?) excavated in 2000-2001 in the foundations of the Palazzo Nervegna in Brindisi. It presents what was understood in antiquity as the key moment of Menander's Samia. Reconsideration of the plot of the play. - See also: Angelo Casanova, A New Mosaic of Menander's Samia (and an Old Relief), Prometheus 40 (2014) pp. 111-114. - Avec résumé en anglais.
